books.title: Harry Potter and The Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Harry Potter's life is miserable. His parents are dead and he's stuck with his heartless relatives. But everything changes when a mysterious letter arrives, inviting him to a school of magic...

books.title: Harry Potter and The Chamber of Secrets
books.author: J.K. Rowling

books.title: Percy Jackson and The Lightning Thief
books.author: Rick Riordan

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: Set in the distant future amidst a feudal interstellar society, Dune tells the story of Paul Atreides and the desert planet Arrakis, the only source of the most valuable substance in the universe.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit, is whisked away from his comfortable home to join a quest to reclaim a treasure from the dragon Smaug.

books.title: A Game of Thrones
books.author: George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, powerful families vie for control of the Iron Throne as an ancient evil stirs in the North.
books.series: A Song of Ice and Fire

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality told through the eyes of young Scout Finch in the Deep South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother, where independent thought is a crime.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: The tragic story of Jay Gatsby, a wealthy man who throws extravagant parties in pursuit of a lost love.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: Elizabeth Bennet navigates issues of manners, upbringing, morality, and marriage in early 19th century England.

books.title: The Hunger Games
books.author: Suzanne Collins
books.description: In a dystopian future, children are chosen by lottery to participate in a televised fight to the death.

books.title: The Da Vinci Code
books.author: Dan Brown
books.description: A symbologist and a cryptologist uncover a religious mystery protected by a secret society for centuries.
